# NSSharingServicePickerToolbarItemDelegate

**Protocol**

An interface that provides the content to share from the macOS share sheet.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol NSSharingServicePickerToolbarItemDelegate : NSSharingServicePickerDelegate
```

## Overview

Adopt the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSharingServicePickerToolbarItemDelegate] protocol in one of your app’s custom types and use it to provide shareable content. Assign your delegate object to an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSharingServicePickerToolbarItem] object you add to your window’s toolbar.

## Providing the Items to Share

- **items(for:)**: Asks the delegate for the items to share.

## Getting the Toolbar Items

- **delegate**: The custom object from your app that provides the items to share.
- **activityItemsConfiguration**: The custom object from an app built with Mac Catalyst that provides the items to share.

## Inherits From

- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSharingServicePickerDelegate
